12d = 1100b
0.625 * 2 = 1.25
0.25 * 2 = 0.5
0.5 * 2 = 1.0
0.625d =  101d
12.625d = 1100.101b = 1.100101 * 2^(3)
S = 0
E = 127 + 3 = 130d = 1000 0010b
Sig = 100 1010 0000 0000 0000 0000

0 1000 0010 100 1010 0000 0000 0000 0000

X = -3050
3050d = 1011 1110 1010 = 1.01111101010 * 2^11
S = 1
E = 127 + 11 = 138 = 1000 1010b
Sib = 01111101010000...

1 1000 1010 0111 1101 0100 00...
 
X = +1.1 * 2^(-128)
S = 0
E = 1023 - 128 = 895d = 011 0111 1111b
Sig = 1
0 011 0111 1111 1000 0000....


X = 6
6d = 110 = 1.10 * 2^2
S = 0 
E = 127 + 2 = 129d = 1000 0010 
Sig = 10
0 1000 0010 1000 0000 ...

X = 0.1015625
0.1015625 * 2 = 0.203125
0.203125 * 2 = 0.40625
0.40625 * 2 = 0.8125
0.8125 * 2 = 1.625
0.625 * 2 = 1.25
0.25 * 2 = 0.5
0.5 * 2 = 1.0
X = 0.0001101d = 1.101 * 2^(-4)
S = 0
E = 127 + (-4) = 123d = 0111 1011b
Sig = 1010 ...
0  0111 1011 1010 ...	

X = 0.1
0.1 * 2 = 0.2
0.2 * 2 = 0.4
0.4 * 2 = 0.8
0.8 * 2 = 1.6
0.6 * 2 = 1.2
0.2 * 2 = 0.4
...
000110011001100... = 1.10011001... * 2^(-4)
S = 0
E = 127 - 4 = 123 = 0111 1011b
Sig = 1001 1001 1001 1001 1001 100
0 0111 1011 1001 1001 1001 1001 1001 101


0 10001000 01101100001000000000000
S = 0 => +
E = 10001000b = 128 + 8 = 136 = 127 + e => e = 9
Sig = 01101100001 = 2^(-2) + 2^(-3) + 2^(-5) + 2^(-6) + 2^(-11)
1.01101100001b * 2^9 = 101101100001b * 2^(-2) = 2913 * 0.25 = 728.25

1 01000110 01101011000000000000000
S = 1 => -
E = 01000110 = 70 = 127 + e => e = -57
Sig = 01101011
1.01101011 * 2^(-57) = 101101011 * 2^(-65) = 363 * 2^(-65)
